net.proteusframework.core.locale.annotation

Annotation Type I18NFiles


  • @Target(value=PACKAGE)
@Documented
@Retention(value=SOURCE)
public @interface I18NFiles
    This allows multiple files to be defined for i18n records on the package level.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      I18NFile[] value
      The record sets.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract I18NFile[] value
        The record sets.
        Returns:
        2 or more record sets.
